abstract:
In this paper, we propose new chaotic version
to enhance Logistic Map (ELM), this latter owns the large
chaotic ambit and the best chaotic performances compared to
classical logistic map. We have carried out investigations on its
applications, by proposing a chaotic magic transform (CMT),
an efficient permutation in the pixel locations of the image and
their values with low time in encryption and decryption process.
In addition, a new image encryption scheme has been proposed.
Security analysis and simulation results have been performed,
this proved that the proposed scheme is capable to safeguard
images at low duration and a high safety level and also able to
resist into several known attacks.
